# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and has the potential to transform your business or personal endeavors. Considering its exceptional quality and the impact it can have on your future success, we are offering this unique opportunity at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Don't miss out on this chance to own a piece of unparalleled value. Should you require any further information or wish to discuss the details, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
